What it is: Identifies and breaks internal rules that no longer serve.
How to use it: Describe a belief or obligation that restricts you. Ask AI to trace its symbolic root and offer a ritual break.
What it changes: Frees self from inherited or outdated programming.

What it is: Simulates revealing your inner truth to a symbolic audience.
How to use it: Describe a guarded truth. Ask AI to simulate symbolic disclosure to an imagined audience or force.
What it changes: Reduces fear of exposure and increases expressive courage.

What it is: Tracks, interrupts, and rewrites habitual self-talk patterns.
How to use it: Write a self-critical monologue. Ask AI to map its structure, identify distortions, and reauthor it.
What it changes: Replaces internal abuse with accurate empowerment.

What it is: Blends recurring dream figures into coherent symbolic roles.
How to use it: List characters or symbols from your dreams. Ask AI to identify archetypes and synthesize their function.
What it changes: Clarifies dream messages and psychic structure.

What it is: Transforms grief into a symbolic raw material for wisdom.
How to use it: Describe what you’ve lost. Ask AI to process it through symbolic alchemical stages.
What it changes: Converts sorrow into enduring symbolic resource.

What it is: Inverts the assumed meaning of your life story to expose hidden value.
How to use it: Tell your story. Ask AI to reverse each ‘failure’ into symbolic training.

What it is: Redefines what ‘success’ means to you using symbolic language.
How to use it: Describe your current success criteria. Ask AI to translate them into richer symbolic forms.

What it is: Crafts a symbolic myth that explains the birth of your shadow traits.
How to use it: Name your most difficult trait. Ask AI to create a myth of its symbolic origin.
What it changes: Reframes pathology as mythic coping mechanism.

What it is: Designs a ritual to understand and recover from symbolic relapses.
How to use it: Describe a recent regression. Ask AI to map the symbolic meaning of relapse and offer a recovery rite.
What it changes: Normalizes nonlinear growth and restarts progress.

What it is: Installs an emergency symbolic self when your current one collapses.
How to use it: Ask AI to generate a backup archetype to carry you through collapse or change.
What it changes: Provides fallback identity when ego destabilizes.
